content.html: Hey Benji. Interesting, yes, the rattling seems to be a common issue. Sadly mine are out of warranty, and although I’ve had good usage out of them, I’ve not abused them so it does sting a little bit. I think I’ll hang on and see if they’re upgraded and, likewise, will replace.
